title: BMW Cuts 2025 Profit Forecast as China Weakens and Tariffs Weigh
description: BMW has revised its 2025 financial outlook downward, citing weaker growth in China, delayed tariff reimbursements, and rising import costs. The automaker now expects group pre-tax earnings to decline slightly compared to 2024, with the automotive division’s return on capital falling to between 8 ...
titleSummary: "BMW Dims Earnings Outlook Amid Global Turmoil in China Markets and Trade Tensions"
descriptionSummary: BMW's 2025 financial projections have been adjusted downward due to slower growth in China, delayed compensation for tariffs, and increasing import expenses. As a result, the company expects reduced pre-tax earnings and a lower return on investment for its core automotive business.

title: Toyota Tests Drone System to Boost Off-Road Capability
description: Toyota is exploring a new way to enhance off-road capability, by sending a drone ahead of the vehicle. According to a recent filing with the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration, the automaker is developing a small drone system designed to give drivers real-time aerial awareness in rugged or ...
titleSummary: "Toyota Takes to the Skies with Autonomous Drone Technology Trials"
descriptionSummary: Toyota is pushing the boundaries of off-road exploration, employing a cutting-edge technology that sends a miniature aerial scout ahead of the vehicle, providing drivers with enhanced situational awareness on challenging terrain.

title: Porsche Is Pulling the Plug on Its Most Competitive Racing Program

titleSummary: Porsche Abandons its Crown Jewel of Motorsport Competitions

title: Your Next Family Road Trip Just Got Infinitely Quieter Thanks to GM

Starting with 2025 and newer models, Disney+ streaming is now available in select Chevrolet, Cadillac and GMC SUVs. It joins an already impressive lineup that includes Hulu, Tubi, YouTube and YouTube Kids. The feature requires ...
